verses.verse: וָאָשׁ֕וּב <S%H7725><s%> Then I turned וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up עֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָֽאֶרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מְגִלָּ֥ה <S%H4039><s%> roll עָפָֽה׃ <S%H5774><s%> and behold a flying

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> I רֹאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> unto me What seest וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> thou? And I answered אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> I see מְגִלָּ֣ה <S%H4039><s%> roll עָפָ֔ה <S%H5774><s%> a flying אָרְכָּהּ֙ <S%H753><s%> the length עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> thereof [is] twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרָחְבָּ֖הּ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> thereof ten בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָֽאָלָ֔ה <S%H423><s%> he unto me This [is] the curse הַיּוֹצֵ֖את <S%H3318><s%> that goeth forth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> over the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> surely כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone הַגֹּנֵ֗ב <S%H1589><s%> for every one that stealeth מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> This כָּמ֣וֹהָ <S%H3644><s%> [as] on this side according נִקָּ֔ה <S%H5352><s%> shall be cut off וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone הַנִּ֨שְׁבָּ֔ע <S%H7650><s%> to it and every one that sweareth מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> one כָּמ֥וֹהָ <S%H3644><s%> [as] on that side according נִקָּֽה׃ <S%H5352><s%> shall be cut off

הוֹצֵאתִ֗יהָ <S%H3318><s%> I will bring it forth נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וּבָ֙אָה֙ <S%H935><s%> and it shall enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house הַגַּנָּ֔ב <S%H1590><s%> of the thief וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> and into the house הַנִּשְׁבָּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> of him that sweareth בִּשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely וְלָ֙נֶה֙ <S%H3885><s%> and it shall remain בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house וְכִלַּ֖תּוּ <S%H3615><s%> and shall consume וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for עֵצָ֥יו <S%H6086><s%> it with the timber וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֲבָנָֽיו׃ <S%H68><s%> thereof and the stones

וַיֵּצֵ֕א <S%H3318><s%> with me went forth הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֑י וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> unto me Lift up נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> now thine eyes וּרְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and see מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> what הַיּוֹצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> what [is] this that goeth forth הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> I

וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> And I said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> and he וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> What [is] it? And he said זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָֽאֵיפָה֙ <S%H374><s%> This [is] an ephah הַיּוֹצֵ֔את <S%H3318><s%> that goeth forth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> He said זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֵינָ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> moreover This [is] their resemblance בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> through all the earth

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold כִּכַּ֥ר <S%H3603><s%> a talent עֹפֶ֖רֶת <S%H5777><s%> of lead נִשֵּׂ֑את <S%H5375><s%> And behold there was lifted up וְזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> is a אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> woman אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> and this [is] a יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> that sitteth בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> of the ephah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָרִשְׁעָ֔ה <S%H7564><s%> This [is] wickedness וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <S%H7993><s%> And he cast אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> it into the midst הָֽאֵיפָ֑ה <S%H374><s%> of the ephah וַיַּשְׁלֵ֛ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and he cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> the weight הָעֹפֶ֖רֶת <S%H5777><s%> of lead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on פִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> upon the mouth ס

וָאֶשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> Then lifted I up עֵינַ֜י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָאֵ֗רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> and there שְׁתַּ֨יִם <S%H8147><s%> two נָשִׁ֤ים <S%H802><s%> women יֽוֹצְאוֹת֙ <S%H3318><s%> and behold there came out וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and the wind בְּכַנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3671><s%> [was] in their wings וְלָהֵ֥נָּה <S%H2007><s%> for they had כְנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> wings כְּכַנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> like the wings הַחֲסִידָ֑ה <S%H2624><s%> of a stork וַתִּשֶּׂ֙אנָה֙ <S%H5375><s%> and they lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֵיפָ֔ה <S%H374><s%> the ephah בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> between the earth וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> I to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֑י אָ֛נָה <S%H575><s%> Where הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> are they מֽוֹלִכ֖וֹת <S%H1980><s%> taking אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> ephah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me לִבְנֽוֹת־ <S%H1129><s%> unto me To build לָ֥הֿ בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> it an house בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land שִׁנְעָ֑ר <S%H8152><s%> of Shinar וְהוּכַ֛ן <S%H3559><s%> and it shall be established וְהֻנִּ֥יחָה <S%H3240><s%> and set שָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> her own מְכֻנָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H4369><s%> there upon her own base ס
